name: Space Rollers (Pre-Alpha 0.0.1)
description:
Space Rollers (Alpha test version 1.0.1

Space Rollers is an open world adventure game. Roll your ball around the massive game world. Collect golden blocks, Destruct walls, Kill ghosts you are free to do whatever you want.

Please keep in mind that this is just an pre-alpha test version. If you discover any bugs or glitches or have any tips please tell me.

This game is completly free of charge

Important notice: This is the earliest version of the game available. this looks in no way whatsoever like the latest version of the game (1.1.2. 31 july 2016). If you want a good impression of the game, please download the latest version available.
